name: After the Light
description:
Announcement: At the beginning of next week (12.-18. July), we will upload a post-jam version which will make inbetween session saving possible and ease out some of the more confusing parts of the game!

Félix Jung (Level Design, Modelling, Illustration)

www.jungfelix.com

Jonas Rühl (Level Design, Texturing, Programming)

https://yonn.itch.io/

Fabi Gimpel (Composing)

https://www.instagram.com/habian666/

https://soundcloud.com/habian666

Thanks to:

Yvonne Lang (Playtesting)

Elija Rühl (Playtesting)

Carlotta Kraft (Playtesting)

Special thanks to Knut Øverbye whose Dungeon Crawler Toolkit for Unreal Engine we used and who provided an insane amount of support for our many questions!

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/Knut+Overbye

All the other UE assets used were free or Free for the Month at some time:

Amplify LUT Pack

Animated Pond Fish

Arch Vis Polish Pack #2

GameTextures.com 2020

Ice Cool

Immersive Dark Ambient Music

Interactive Lights

Meadow Environment Set

Office Scene

robinhood76, metrostock99, under7dude, niwki, qubodup, thesubber, vincitveritas, thepriest, 140178sound, ebcrosby, inspectorj, reymanor, dkiller2204, tbsounddesigns, deathscyp, florianreichelt, soundflakes, missburnsoleer2011, angelkuner, magnuswalker, newlocknew, nachtmahrtv
